mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sail (siCode, startSail, endSail, startLat, startLng, endLat, endLng) VALUES (#{siCode}, #{startSail}, #{endSail}, #{startLat}, #{startLng}, #{endLat}, #{endLng});
mapper.select: select * from sail where sailNum=#{sailNum} and siCode=#{siCode}
mapper.delete: delete from sail where sailNum=#{sailNum} and siCode=#{siCode}
